title: Skin Idea: Dragon Slayer Darius
body:
**~ Dragon Slayer Darius ~**

Look

------------

http://th02.deviantart.net/fs70/PRE/f/2012/283/6/a/dominator_by_tamplierpainter-d5hdgek.jpg

-------------

**Abilities**

**Passive:**
Tongues of flame circling affected target, when all 5 are applied target is engulfed in flames.

**Q:**
Darius spins his axe and has fire follow in its path.

**W:**
Dariusâ€™s axe ignites in flames leaving a trail of smoke as he travels and has a fire / explosion effect when he hits his target.

**E:**
Has fiery claw animation and leaves claw marks on the ground.

**R:**
Axe lights on fire leaving a trail of flames in the air as he swings it. He also catches on fire himself as he jumps up and makes a fiery explosion when his axe connects with his target.
Remains on fire if he kills a target.

**Recall:**
Cleaves axe into ground and breaths fire through his helmet.

Plz check out my Champion Ideas!

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/43gBydKo-champion-idea-trading-reviews-we-are-all-dreaming-of-red-reply

~ Diamondmatthew

replies.body: I'd buy the skin in a heartbeat.

A heartbeat you say?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PdWg6xv3LqU
Puns of damage.

That looks purty sah-weet!

Thanks for sharing!
Yes a Rito member! Thx man and no problem!

Hey Zwill, I don't want to push my luck, but I would be estatic if you could check out a couple of my champion concepts!

I just kinda want to know what a Rito member thinks.

P.S. Bethemos is the most popular.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/43gBydKo-champion-idea-trading-reviews-we-are-all-dreaming-of-red-reply

I'm more than happy to look at them, but my ken of design and artistic value is, how do you say, lacking ;). 

That being said, I am always amazed and humbled by the amount of effort and dedication that goes into *any* player creations. 

Andy
Thx a lot man, Plz feel free to comment and post suggestions and if you like them, maybe show some other Rito people.
Love the idea, only if...
Dunkmaster wasn't just released so Riot won't ever look at Darius for another 2 years...minimum.
If only Darius wasn't toxic.
But his DoT is a Bleed, not a Poison D:

I WANT THIS PLS RIOT{{champion:122}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:122}}
Pretty awesome concept, 10/10 would by.
Hey guys, should be releasing a new champ within a week or so!
This sounds more like Dragon-Kin Darius. The Dovah would be proud of their child born of man though.
My problem is that a lot of the flame effects are already used in the Dunkmaster skin.
They better keep the helm when they make this
This looks awesome! Great job, man :)
that skin is good but i wont skin spotlight hehe but its very good  it well be awesome just little rework and boom gj man
i would sell my kdny for it .....
Darius really needs a skin that puts him in some bad ass armor.
feels like my Skyrim character {{champion:122}}

I love Skyrim so much for the ignorance of the AI. 

They shit talk you so much, Ignoring the fact that you're armor is made of the hearts of Demons and your weapons are made from the bones of dragons who's souls you stole and now use as a form of magic. 

BTW remember that guy that was about the EAT THE UNIVERSE...i killed him, almost single handedly. Those other guys where there for morale support. 

Yet muggers run try to rob me, Nords talk down to me saying that I'm just Breton filth and  Vampires think they're the biggest whoop when i literalyl just ripped their leaders head off, destroyed his castle and made off with his daughter.
Ult automatically plays a heavy metal/power metal song if successfully killed someone

I like the idea but I like dragon slayer yasuo (or maybe blade, that'll be cool) better. He fits in asthe midlaners for the team and synergises a lot more with the team. Swing as the team has lots of cc and tank I would really like dragon slayer yasuo
